keywords.value: Beyond Sacred: Voices of Muslim Identity (Play)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: Five young New Yorkers are featured in Ping Chong + Company’s new work of interview-based theater at LaGuardia Performing Arts Center in Long Island City, Queens.

headline.print_headline: Tales of the Outsider, Colored by Nuances of Religion
headline.main: Review: ‘Beyond Sacred: Voices of Muslim Identity,’ Young New Yorkers Tell Their Stories

snippet: Five young New Yorkers are featured in Ping Chong + Company’s new work of interview-based theater at LaGuardia Performing Arts Center in Long Island City, Queens.
abstract: Laura Collins-Hughes reviews Ping Chong & Company production Beyond Sacred: Voices of Muslim Identity, interview-based theater work consisting of five young New Yorkers relating experience of being marginalized because they are Muslim, at LaGuardia Performing Arts Center in Long Island City.
